welcome_content: The idea behind the app is to give you a set of tools to manage people and activities. More tools will be implemented in the future to manage other things
let_s_start_opening_the_side_menu: Let's start opening the side menu
this_is_your_calendar_page: This is your Calendar page where you will see everything you have planned for your company
add_page_where_you_can: Add page where you can add projects, tasks, roster and team members
here_you_can_see: Here you can see and add all the team members
here_is_your_work_tab: Here is your Work tab you can find all the tasks and rosters planned
all_the_tasks_and_rosters: All the tasks and rosters waiting to start will show on this Waiting to Start tab
everything_that_is_ongoing: Everything that is ongoing for the day will show in this In Progress tab
once_the_tasks_and_rosters: Once the tasks and rosters are completed they will move to this Done tab
in_the_events_you_can: In the Events you can find everything waiting to accept and accepted
all_the_rosters_and_tasks: All the rosters and tasks before accepted they will be in this Waiting to Accept tab
rosters_and_tasks_denied: If the rosters and tasks are denied they will move to the Denied tab and you can edit later
rosters_and_tasks_accepted: And the rosters and tasks are accepted will move to the Accepted tab
thanks_for_downloading_the_mou_app: Thanks for downloading the app, there is so much we plan on offering for you, keep using us and soon you will see how much it will help you
the_last_thing_to_finish: The last thing to finish, to be able to use anything on the app, we need to add team members and a store on settings. You have up to 4 team members to add for free. Click on the icon below to start
delete_roster_warning: You want to delete this roster?

deny_roster_warning: You want to deny this roster?
cancel_roster_warning: You want to cancel this roster?
